[[Banahaw Broadcasting Corporation]] (1973-1986)| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 5 Watts| homepage = | }} '''DXCC-TV''', channel 10, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]]. Its studios are located at Velez St., Cagayan de Oro City. ==See also== *[[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]] {{Cagayan De Oro TV}} {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[Category:Television stations in Cagayan de Oro City]] [[Category:Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation stations]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] [[ceb:DXCC-TV]]
